sqlDatabaseProjects.description: Design and publish SQL database schemas
sqlDatabaseProjects.generateProjectFromO: Generate SQL Project from OpenAPI/Swagger spec (Preview)
sqlDatabaseProjects.dotnetInstallLocatio: Full path to .NET SDK on the machine. For example, if dotnet.exe is located at C:\folder1\dotnet\dotnet.exe, set the path for this setting to C:\folder1\dotnet
sqlDatabaseProjects.netCoreDoNotAsk: Whether to prompt the user to install .NET SDK when not detected.
sqlDatabaseProjects.nodejsDoNotAsk: Whether to prompt the user to install Node.js when not detected.
sqlDatabaseProjects.autorestSqlVersion: Which version of Autorest.Sql to use from NPM.  Latest will be used if not set.
sqlDatabaseProjects.microsoftBuildSqlVer: Which version of Microsoft.Build.Sql SDK to use for building legacy sql projects. Example: 0.1.7-preview
sqlDatabaseProjects.enablePreviewFeature: Enable preview SQL Database Projects features
sqlDatabaseProjects.welcome:
No database projects currently open.
[New Project](command:sqlDatabaseProjects.new)
[Open Project](command:sqlDatabaseProjects.open)
[Create Project From Database](command:sqlDatabaseProjects.importDatabase)
